title: Sold: T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait PSA 1
author: Kris19

posts.post_title: Sold: T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait PSA 1
posts.post_content:
One more Cobb red portrait from me.  This one is a PSA 1.  Good eye appeal with one major crease and a few light horizontal creases across the card.  Registration and centering are very nice.  Sweet Cap 350-460 Factory 42 Overprint back.

Sold, net to me, with PayPal preferred.  Please PM or email me at [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url] to purchase or with any questions.  Thanks!
PSA keeps getting tougher and tougher in my opinion!  The crease is significant, but the overall appearance of the card is nice.  I’ll take 1’s like this all day long.

Absolute beauty! Congrats on the sale! 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Best looking "1" I've seen. Congrats on sale.
